name: Gaunt One
description: The Gaunt One is a tall, thin aberration with elongated limbs and a predatory grace. It has sharp claws and a haunting appearance that instills fear in its opponents.
memorable: Its ability to extract and consume the hearts of its victims makes it particularly terrifying.
goals: To hunt and consume humanoids, exploiting its grappling abilities.
relations: It may be related to other aberrations or serve darker entities craving for chaos.
environment: Often found in shadowy, secluded places or areas where humanoids gather.
strengths: Exceptional grappling capabilities and a powerful heart-extracting attack.
weaknesses: Very low Charisma makes it poor in social interactions.
attacks: Can make swift claw attacks that deal slashing damage and grapple targets, followed by a deadly heart extraction.
most_powerful_ability: Extract Heart allows it to kill a grappled humanoid by consuming their heart, dealing massive damage.
senses: Possesses Keen Hearing, granting it advantage on perception checks involving sound.
skills: Proficient in Stealth, allowing it to hide effectively.
additional_information: Natural armor grants a solid defense.
Moderate challenge rating of 3 poses an interesting threat to adventurers.
High Strength enables significant physical confrontation.
Decent Dexterity contributes to evading attacks.
Extract Heart ability is both brutal and memorable.
test_queries: tall thin monster that consumes humanoids
stealthy monster with keen hearing ability
